valueAndEquityCriteria.name: EstimatedValue
valueAndEquityCriteria.description: The estimate of the property's value based on public records data (automated valuation model or AVM)

valueAndEquityCriteria.name: EstValuePerSqFt
valueAndEquityCriteria.description: The estimated value per square foot (estimated value divided by sq ft)

valueAndEquityCriteria.name: EstimatedEquityDollars
valueAndEquityCriteria.description: The estimated dollar value of equity (estimated property value minus sum of all loans modeled to be open)

valueAndEquityCriteria.name: EstimatedEquityPercent
valueAndEquityCriteria.description: Estimated equity as a percent of the estimated property value taking into account all loans

valueAndEquityCriteria.name: AvailableEquity
valueAndEquityCriteria.description: Shorthand for EstimatedEquityDollars - the dollar value of equity in the property

valueAndEquityCriteria.name: CombinedLoanToValue
valueAndEquityCriteria.description: The combined loan amounts as a percentage of the estimated property value (CLTV)

valueAndEquityCriteria.name: EstimatedOpenLoansBalance
valueAndEquityCriteria.description: The estimated combined amount of all open loans based on computer model

valueAndEquityCriteria.name: EstimatedNumberOfOpenLoans
valueAndEquityCriteria.description: The estimated number of loans currently open and outstanding on the property

valueAndEquityCriteria.name: FreeAndClear
valueAndEquityCriteria.description: Whether the property has no loans or liens (100% equity)

valueAndEquityCriteria.name: Underwater
valueAndEquityCriteria.description: Whether the property has negative equity (loans greater than value)

criteriaTypes.Multiple Values: Accepts an array of multiple values for matching
criteriaTypes.Multiple Range Including Unknowns: Accepts a series of arrays with min and max values and includes properties with unknown values
